parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sensors

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets for which [[Side]] the entity becomes a "confirmed hostile" target - a target that becomes highlighted red on the sensors display.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''confirmSensorTarget''' [side, isConfirmed]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> [side, isConfirmed]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> side: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> isConfirmed: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>([[vehicle]] [[player]]) [[confirmSensorTarget]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[west]], [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setVehicleRadar]], [[setVehicleReportRemoteTargets]], [[vehicleReportRemoteTargets]], [[vehicleReceiveRemoteTargets]], [[setVehicleReceiveRemoteTargets]], [[vehicleReportOwnPosition]], [[setVehicleReportOwnPosition]], [[reportRemoteTarget]]
</value></part></template></root>
